body:
Hi everyone,

I am looking for  approximately 5 teams (with about 6 members from each team) to participate in a small tournament on a separate server of mine. This thread is an application thread for these teams ti join us on this tournament. If and when you are accepted, please abide ALL server rules put into place by me, and my staff on the server. It is suggested  that the leader of the team to apply on this thread.

Application Format:
Skype:
Team Name:
Your 6 team members:
TimeZone: (Preferable something in GMT or EST):

Date:
-November 1

Time:
-First Day: 9am-8pm

Timezone Times:
GMT:9am-8pm
EST:8am-7pm

If you need more information contact me at:
Email:dawteal@outlook.com
Skype:danfromyoutube

Maps:
-2 custom Destroy The Monument Maps
-2 custom Capture The Wool Maps


*I have made a new post because I had to change the times and date seeing that it would be inconvenient for most people seeing it is Halloween.

*Please don't ask anything on this thread contact me if you need more information NOT on this thread

Thanks :D

title: Small Unoffical Tournament

replies.body: P.S we will need some Referees (you don't need the rank) and some builders to finish 1 map and possibly make another one.

Regards
